subject: Excellent understanding of Fixed Income performance attribution from the US and global perspective.
body:
Excellent understanding of Fixed Income performance attribution from the
US and global perspective.
Accountable for the project management and schedules of the business
critical projects for the regional projects.
If that describes you, we'd like to hear from you. Hands on Application
Support and Management responsibility f
This candidate will also be responsible for providing strategic
direction and targeted business knowledge to the application development
efforts for the Index Arbitrage desk. Ability to work well in a team as
well as independently.
Services firms demand that software managers and software developers
have an extremely solid business background. This is a Senior role and
this individual will be expected to guide the team in terms of
attribution techniques and keep the team on the cutting edge of
attribution and other Analytics. Experience of messaging and
asynchronous programming models in distributed systems, including Tibco
based SOA environments. Experience in relational database and SQL
programming, network programming, Java performance tuning, and
experience with developing scalable, robust, high performance systems.
Responsible for prioritizing initiatives with business sponsors from the
sales and trading communities.
Development on substantive application software products. The scope of
this role extends to cover significant street or industry wide
initiatives such as Sox and BaFIN.
Good communication skills and inter-personal skills are expected as the
Analyst will need to interact with users widely throughout the firm.
This candidate will join a development team designing and implementing
Fixed Income Trading and Position Management Applications.
Specific knowledge of street wide compliance initiatives such as SOx and
other industry regulated initiatives.
